item.title: Re-Branding Misshapen Produce and Planting a Million Corals
item.description: Did you know? New Zealand will ban most single-use plastic by 2025. Aotearoa had already banned most single-use plastic bags in 2019, but this new ban includes a wider range of items such as earbuds, spoons and straws.

item.title: ğŸŒ± Turning Face Masks Into Trees and Cleaning up the Ocean
item.description: Good morning ğŸ‘‹ Saturday was World Environment Day! For the occasion, we learned that we throw away 2.12 billion tons of waste every year and discovered fantastic initiatives trying to change that.
